#  Waterproof Ostomy Bag Shower Cover 10"x10", Stoma Bath Protector Shield
Film Adhesive Dressing Bandage for Ostomy Supply Guard Accessory

____

____

____

____

____

(36)

In stock

SKU: KDUSOSC025

Introducing our Pu Membrane Ostomy Shower Guard - Shower with Confidence!
Freedom to Shower: Stay worry-free about your ostomy bag getting wet, shower
with confidence. Multi-purpose Protector: Use it to shield the stoma bag,
protect skin, and prevent warping. Skin-Friendly Design: 3-layer PU film for
comfort and easy movement. Sufficient Quantity: 25 sheets, 10x10 inches each,
perfect for daily use. Warm Tips: Handle with care, single-use only.
Rediscover showering joy with our Ostomy Shower Guard!

Regular price $19.99 USD

2+ items = 10% off! Automatic discount at checkout - Limited-time offer!

US Warehouse - Free Shipping!

SPECIFICATIONS

  * Pu Membrane
  * Imported
  * Ostomy Shower Guard：As a patient with a colostomy, we are always concerned about getting our ostomy bag port wet and not being able to shower, which can lead to infection. This Ostomy Bag Shower Cover Moisture Resistant Membrane gives you the freedom to shower without worry, it keeps everything dry and makes showering a personally enjoyable activity once again.
  * Multi-purpose Stoma Bath Protector Shield Film: The whole sheet can be used to protect the stoma bag from drying when bathing.Cut to size according to the stoma size can be used to protect the skin around the stoma and block excreta. Cutting to the size of the barrier strips can strengthen the chassis adhesion and prevent warping.
  * 3 Layer Design: featuring 3 layers and composed of PU film, adhesive and release paper, our transparent stretch bandages are sticky and skin friendly with nice breathability, which is comfortable and enables you well move as usual.
  * Sufficient Quantity: The package contains 25 sheets of waterproof bandage adhesive covers, each sheet measures about 10x10 inches, sufficient quantity and suitable size for daily use.
  * Warm tips: due to the strong adhesion, we recommend you to peel off the bandage film carefully from the edge; you can simply wipe your skin before use to avoid grease or stains affecting the actual effect; each shower waterproof patch is for single use only.

Tell your brand's story through images

## Learn how to care for your stoma WITH US!

HOW TO CHOOSE THE RIGHT POCKET?

* First of all, we should consider from the type of stoma, operation time, personal practice and so on. Ileum bag maker, due to its excretory material, chooses to open the bag for convenient discharge and cleaning. Colostomy can be done with both open and closed pockets.People who have just had surgery. It is suggested to use transparent pocket to facilitate nursing and observation of stoma.

* One piece pocket making is economical, but it is inconvenient to clean; 

* The two-piece bag can be taken off and cleaned at any time. It is clean and recyclable. It does not need to paste skin repeatedly. It is popular with patients.

HOW TO PREVENT THE BAG FROM FLATULENCE AND INTEREST?

Due to the large amount of gas produced in the intestine, when one-piece dense
bag is used, the bag will often be inflated. At this time, you can choose the
filter.You only need to stick the filter on the top of the stoma bag, and then
use a pin to make a hole in the hole in the center of the filter, and then tie
it straight to the bag, and then make a hole in the bag.

WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS OF WEARING A BELT FOR PATIENTS?

Prolong the use time of paste: increase the sense of security, relieve the
patients' worry about the falling of the pocket; prevent the occurrence of the
stoma hernia.

WHAT DO YOU NEED TO KEEP IN YOUR POUNCHES?

Before sticking, keep the skin dry, keep the skin flat and stick the bag from
the bottom to the top, and use the vertical position or lying position to keep
the skin flat.

HOW TO CLEAN THE CROSSING AND ITS SOLID SKIN?

Use gauze or cotton ball and warm water to clean the stoma and surrounding
skin from inside to outside. Do not need alkaline soap or disinfectant, it is
easy to cause skin, Dry explosion and affect adhesion.

HOW TO STORE YOUR OSTOMY BAG?

The storage environment (10-25c is appropriate) for the products should not be
higher than 40 ℃ or lower than 10 ℃, and the wet environment and heavy
pressure.
